entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Québec
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:37 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quebec Lesage Int'l Airport 2:13 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: E 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
